Uses of Package
opendial.modules.speech

  • Packages that use opendial.modules.speech 
    Package Description
    opendial.plugins  
  • Classes in opendial.modules.speech used by opendial.plugins 
    Class and Description
    SpeechRecogniser
    Basic interface for a speech recogniser that takes an audio stream as input and updates the dialogue state with its recognition results.
    SpeechSynthesiser
    Basic interface for a speech synthesiser that takes a system utterance as input and outputs the corresponding speech sound on the standard audio output.
